text: Yuri Nikolayevich Vasenin (; 2 October 1948 – 2 May 2022) was a Soviet footballer and coach. His career began in 1966. He played for the Soviet Union national football team nine times between 1972 until 1973. Vasenin died on 2 May 2022 at the age of 73.Невосполнимая утрата ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian football managers Category:Russian footballers
title: Yuri Vasenin
